title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 46.1 - Applications for corporate change involving two or more licensed premises
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 46.1 - Applications for corporate change involving two or more licensed premises

State Regulations
(a) Where the same
corporation operates two or more premises separately licensed under this
chapter (L.1963, ch. 204), the licensee shall file one corporate change
application and attach thereto a list of all licenses issued by the Authority
in the name of the licensee. The application shall be filed, together with the
appropriate fee, with the State Liquor Authority on a form and in a manner as
designated by the Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
46.1

Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
